title: S17 Ep99: Tales From The Inverted World: Confederate Gold & Howling Ghosts w/ Shane Cashman
itunes:title: Tales From The Inverted World: Confederate Gold & Howling Ghosts w/ Shane Cashman
description:
Darkness Radio presents Tales From The Inverted World: Confederate Gold and Howling Ghosts with Podcaster/Paranormal Investigator Shane Cashman!

On today's episode, we get to know Shane Cashman, a writer/podcaster/paranormal investigator who doesn't go out looking for trouble, it just seems to find him.  Shan tells us how he ended up starting his "Tales from the Inverted World podcasts and books after strange experiences in Washington, Georgia involving Confederate gold, howling ghosts, strange individuals, UFO's, and... poodles...

Check out two of Shane's podcast videos of Tales From The Inverted World:   https://timcast.com/video/tales-from-the-inverted-world-s2-1-the-skeleton-at-the-gates-to-hell/

https://timcast.com/video/tales-from-the-inverted-world-s2-2-the-gold-the-fire-and-the-howling-ghosts/

Check out the Tales From The Inverted World page:  https://timcast.com/channel/tales-from-the-inverted-world/
